column1: I'm humbled and pleased to have the privilege to represent the people of Arkansas’s Second Congressional District in the House of Representatives for two more years. https://t.co/5C93im3zyz
Thank you Central Arkansas! https://t.co/PkhIEdcQA1
Polls close in less than one hour!  If you arrive to your polling place before 7:30 PM you cannot be turned away.   Stay in line!  Do not leave before casting your vote. https://t.co/lOzwsoIMso

Enjoyed chatting with @KATVNews and @THV11 before voting ends today.  As your representative I’ll continue to lead the fight to:  ✅ Defeat #COVID19  ✅ Lower every Arkansan’s taxes  ✅ Grow our economy for local businesses and workers. https://t.co/xWOEPQm8eX
Great to see lots of enthusiasm before the polls close tonight!  If you haven't voted please go vote!   Visit https://t.co/HQGgVouagK to find your polling place. https://t.co/8CFY6mmgSF
Thank you to all my volunteers for your amazing support in #LittleRock!  Go vote today! https://t.co/N7E4hByGfj

Today on #ElectionDay remember that French Hill is fighting for Arkansas families workers and small businesses. During the pandemic French helped deliver over $8 billion of critical assistance to local businesses keeping Arkansans employed. French will always fight for you. https://t.co/5hfa5yceag
Greeting Central Arkansans as they head to the polls in #Beebe on #ElectionDay https://t.co/UJPSmODbIP
Election Day is here! Go vote!  Polls will close at 7:30 PM tonight.  Find your polling place at https://t.co/HQGgVouagK https://t.co/kuoFnpWt5E
🗳 POLLS ARE OFFICIALLY OPEN! 🗳   Getting a bright and early start to Election Day in #Chenal. https://t.co/vN9SKKIi8j

I’m a Purple Heart and valor decorated veteran.  This year alone Congressman Hill's office was able to secure over $3 million in VA disability claims that were owed to Arkansas veterans.   A vote for Congressman French Hill is a vote for Arkansas veterans.  -Mikel Brooks https://t.co/EVS6d512B9
Team Hill is barnstorming across Central Arkansas on Sign Night!  T-Minus 11.5 hours until polls open. https://t.co/yU5AGIKmOT

“Congressman Hill is a man of integrity and a servant leader.  He works hard for the families of Central Arkansas fighting for what is best for them.  Please vote for French Hill on November 3rd.”  --Josh and Missy Mesker https://t.co/JYAUb1B5av
Huge crowd for early voting at the Dee Brown Library!  Thank you for your continued support. https://t.co/jkMiJF7Fqf
Less than one hour! See you soon. https://t.co/FA6joDeJt2

Making new friends in #Bryant!  Lots of greetings and warm wishes from passers-by. https://t.co/1boVQNbCg0

I'm out campaigning and connecting with voters throughout ALL of the counties in the Second Congressional District.  This morning in #Conway!  #AR02 #AR2 https://t.co/nLs0xqfmie
Great talking to a local French Hill voter in #Conway!  It’s an honor to have his support and your support.  Lots of enthusiastic voters coming out to vote early! https://t.co/SB5mSZOa4I

Tomorrow night is Sign Night at the @ARGOP's headquarters!  Join us at 5:00 PM for the final push before Election Day.   To RSVP email Drew@ElectFrench.com or call (501) 902-9259. https://t.co/6LNCGbnzme
Fueling up for the final stretch!  Thank you to our wonderful team of volunteers. https://t.co/Rt47406Qp9
Couldn’t have asked for a better team to say hello to all of our friends in #Morrilton.    A special thanks to the many volunteers who joined us today in #ConwayCounty! https://t.co/wdXwbafkbF

The weather today was absolutely terrific.  You can always count on me to put #CentralArkansas first.   I will continue to fight for #COVID19 pandemic relief cutting taxes for middle-class families and accountability in government. https://t.co/opPBo4tHHL
Had fun in #WestLittleRock this afternoon.  Election Day is only two days away! Go vote! https://t.co/QBQI2KuWez

I encourage everybody to vote for my friend French Hill on November 3. Without his leadership many small businesses would have shut and people would have lost their jobs. He works for the families and workers of central Arkansas. @ARSenMissyIrvin https://t.co/FqqQEPySYf
French Hill along with Democrats oversee the Treasury Department and the Federal Reserve for pandemic relief.   Don't fall for lies from liberal Super PACs. https://t.co/mJkg29hkgt

Here are the facts: French Hill lowered taxes for all Arkansans.   After historic tax reform a typical Arkansas family of four would get to keep $2000 more in their pocket each year. https://t.co/PvP0UEuaU0
French Hill has lowered taxes for ALL Arkansans. https://t.co/3qDyBX0801

Fun time tonight at the #BooBrier!    This “Trunk or Treat” event was a safe and festive way for #Arkansans to spend time with their kids.    Thank you to the City of #Greenbrier and the #GreenbrierChamberofCommerce for hosting this creative event for our community. https://t.co/AWVvHmigLf

Each Halloween the Clinton Volunteer Fire Department hosts a spooky but safe “Scare on the Square” festival.    Good seeing Mayor Richard McCormac along with the trick-or-treaters at the Courthouse Square in #Clinton. https://t.co/sB6cxLPDKo
My favorite road in Faulkner County. Go Hogs! Beat A&M! #WPS https://t.co/958lkUnXmD

Great turnout in #Conway! Thank you @SarahHuckabee Sanders for joining us today and for your support!  I’m running for Congress to help our families rebuild our economy and renew the American dream.  Together we can continue our fight for #CentralArkansas! https://t.co/ICSnBRc2H8
Less than 30 minutes until our event begins in #Conway! https://t.co/b1HmMtRV8N

Calling all #CentralArkansans!  Martha and I are making phone calls asking you for your vote.  If you haven't I hope you will vote for me today Monday or Tuesday.   If you have voted encourage your friends to head to the polls.   I am grateful for your support! https://t.co/ocQhmhNsgt

Always fun joining supporters in #LittleRock!   Appreciate the support from the African American Coalition of Arkansas.   Thank you for your support and remember to vote this Tuesday November 3! https://t.co/8t90Q6H0Ls

Fueling up for a full day of campaigning at my favorite breakfast place!  Great people and good food at @WaffleHouse; nothing beats it.  Always enjoy catching up with my fellow #Arkansans during each visit. Honored to serve the people of #CentralArkansas in Congress. https://t.co/336fmi2L4Q

Our firefighters are true heroes.  Martha and I stopped by some of our local fire stations this morning to see firsthand the work they are doing and thank them for their service - especially during this pandemic. https://t.co/YtncRcEMU1
Nothing better than high school football on a Friday night!  North Little Rock High School vs Bryant High School.  Biggest game of the year because both teams are undefeated. https://t.co/ynEO8liavr
Join @SarahHuckabee Sanders and me for a rally in Simon Park tomorrow at 2:00 PM.   Help us safely get out the vote in #Conway! https://t.co/MNbYKHUp1J

Great turnout at #Searcy Supporter Luncheon!  I appreciate State Rep. @Les_D_Eaves State Sen. @Dismang my colleagues from the #Arkansas congressional delegation - Senator @Boozman4AR @TomCottonAR and @Crawford4Cong - as well as @Liz_Cheney for joining me today.  #GoVote #AR02 https://t.co/f8m6MBGuFs

I am thankful to have an advocate in Washington for our schools and for our kids. That advocate is French Hill.  French has fought for our students and our teachers especially during the COVID era.  Please join me in voting for French Hill for Congress.  -Susan Cottle https://t.co/NsK7EkbIYc

If we want to rebuild our economy if we want to defeat #COVID19 if we want to restore our country I am the best person to represent you and your family.  In Congress I have delivered $8 billion in relief to struggling #CentralArkansas families workers and small businesses. https://t.co/H3NqBhiC2w
Will be joining @KARK4News soon for Pancakes & Politics! https://t.co/q0mC7dk0kR

Exciting night in #Benton with @Boozman4AR @TomCottonAR @SteveScaliseGOP @GovMikeHuckabee @WestermanAR @RonnyJackson4TX and @LisaForCongress!  Great crowd tasty BBQ and positive energy.  Thank you for your support and your vote!   Election Day is only 5 days away! https://t.co/h9HhxPQqMG

Great to see children safely back in the classroom!  Election Day is right around the corner! 5 days to go!  Go to your local polling location and vote!   Please visit https://t.co/HQGgVouagK to check your registration and find your polling place! https://t.co/Oo8EPYSLYK

Calling all #FaulknerCounty supporters!   Head over to Simon Park in #Conway on Saturday afternoon at 2:00 PM to hear from my good friend and constituent former White House Press Secretary @SarahHuckabee Sanders.  Don’t forget to wear a mask! https://t.co/Z9dlQT1ken

My confidence and my vote are in French Hill.   He is for the Arkansas worker and for the Arkansas veteran.  When you vote this year vote for confidence vote for Congressman French Hill  - a man who loves this state and a man who loves his country.  -Jamol Jones https://t.co/4o3QDj89Gu

Will @GovMikeHuckabee @TomCottonAR @SteveScaliseGOP and I see you at this afternoon's BBQ?   Doors open at 5:30 PM at the Benton Event Center.  Due to #COVID19 there is limited availability.   Contact awells@arkansasgop.org to reserve your spot or call (501) 372-7301. https://t.co/628XOsELIY

I've been a teacher for twenty-seven years. With the help of leaders like French Hill I have been able to get back in the classroom...doing what I love to do—and that is teaching my kids face-to-face. Please get out and vote for French Hill.  -Marjorie Davis https://t.co/lup7bsAbqb

Join former @GovMikeHuckabee @TomCottonAR @SteveScaliseGOP and me for some good old fashioned BBQ.  Doors open at 5:30 PM at the Benton Event Center but there is limited availability due to #COVID19.  Please contact @ARGOP to reserve your spot by calling (501) 372-7301. https://t.co/DPB4BFgtXR

French Hill is a principled steady and consistent leader.  We need the smartest people in the room leading our nation through this crisis and representing the interests of #Arkansas.  Please join me in re-electing Congressman French Hill.  - Sharon Tallach Vogelpohl https://t.co/3mxaUXeeGY
Proud to have exercised my right to vote today!  Go vote early! https://t.co/XdepxNf2JG

Six years ago I pledged to you if elected to work to remove the wet blanket of unnecessary government regulation.   Since then I have kept my promise to revitalize our nation by cutting bureaucratic red tape.   In Congress I’ll never stop fighting for you and your family. https://t.co/DwzCvzoCxy
